question: Inheritance in Python allows a child class to ________ properties and behaviors from a parent class.
To customize an inherited method, you use the technique of ________ in the child class.
The ________ function is used to call a parent class method from a child class.
Inheritance helps improve code ________ by allowing classes to reuse common logic.
Method overriding allows a child class to provide a specific implementation for a method already defined in its ________ class.
In Python, you can use ________ inheritance to create a class that inherits from more than one parent class.
Multiple inheritance can lead to conflicts, which Python resolves using ________ order (MRO).
To view the method resolution order of a class, you can use the ________ attribute or method.
Inheritance is useful for creating a hierarchy of classes where one class is a type of ________.
Method specialization helps improve code ________ by allowing child classes to customize inherited behaviors.
